name: Vexdiscus
description:
From the maker of Kliq the Video Knight comes the most revolutionary disc throwing game since Discs of Tron: Vexdiscus!  Battle against intelligent computer-controlled opponents as they try to stop you from defeating their master! With the Unity Engine, Vexdiscus brings home stunning 3-D polygonal graphics so lifelike that you wonder how no game in 1986 can match! And for the low price of $0*, how could you say no?  So delete that boring copy of Battle Disc and make room for Vexdiscus: the game of the next millennium!

*Donations are greatly appreciated.
